txt.en: Featured Instances are available now that you have reached level 100. Completing the Featured Instance grants specially selected rewards, including premier equipment when the instance is played at cap level. You can earn Featured Instance rewards once per day at cap level and once per day at level 100 to cap, with an optional reset.\n\nLook for the current Featured Instance, which rotates weekly, in the Instance Finder Panel and in the instance launch and join panels.
